languages.text: "Офицеры не желают селиться подле ваших покоев, так как страдают от постоянных эмоциональных вспышек. Некоторые даже калечат себя и других".

traits.locale_text: "Офицеры не желают селиться подле ваших покоев, так как страдают от постоянных эмоциональных вспышек. Некоторые даже калечат себя и других".

languages.text: "The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."
languages.original_text: "Офицеры не желают селиться подле ваших покоев, так как страдают от постоянных эмоциональных вспышек. Некоторые даже калечат себя и других".

traits.locale_text: "The officers do not wish to settle next to your chambers because they suffer from emotional outbursts. Some even maim themselves and others."
"The officers do not wish to settle next to your chambers because they suffer from emotional outbursts. Some even maim themselves and others."
"The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."
"The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."
"The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."

languages.text: “军官们不愿驻守在你的房间旁边，因为这会让他们产生持续不断的情绪爆发。一部分军官甚至会残害自己与他人。”
languages.original_text: "The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."

traits.locale_text: “军官们不愿驻守在你的房间旁边，因为这会让他们产生持续不断的情绪爆发。一部分军官甚至会残害自己与他人。”

languages.text: «Los oficiales no quieren tener camarotes junto a sus aposentos dados los estallidos emocionales constantes que les produce. Algunos han llegado a mutilarse a sí mismos y a los demás».
languages.original_text: "The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."

traits.locale_text: «Los oficiales no quieren tener camarotes junto a sus aposentos dados los estallidos emocionales constantes que les produce. Algunos han llegado a mutilarse a sí mismos y a los demás».

languages.text: 「士官たちは、いつでも感情の爆発に巻き込まれたくないがために、カシア殿の執務室の隣に陣取ることを嫌がる。自分や他人を傷つける者さえいるのだ」
languages.original_text: "The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."

traits.locale_text: 「士官たちは、いつでも感情の爆発に巻き込まれたくないがために、カシア殿の執務室の隣に陣取ることを嫌がる。自分や他人を傷つける者さえいるのだ」

languages.text: "Die Offiziere wollen nicht neben Eurem Quartier untergebracht werden, weil sie dann ständig emotionale Ausbrüche erleiden. Einige haben sogar schon sich selbst und andere verstümmelt."
languages.original_text: "The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."

traits.locale_text: "Die Offiziere wollen nicht neben Eurem Quartier untergebracht werden, weil sie dann ständig emotionale Ausbrüche erleiden. Einige haben sogar schon sich selbst und andere verstümmelt."

languages.text: « Les officiers sont réticents à loger près de vos quartiers en raison des crises de nerfs que vous semblez provoquer en permanence. Certains en seraient même venus à se mutiler et à attaquer leurs camarades. »
languages.original_text: "The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."

traits.locale_text: « Les officiers sont réticents à loger près de vos quartiers en raison des crises de nerfs que vous semblez provoquer en permanence. Certains en seraient même venus à se mutiler et à attaquer leurs camarades. »

languages.text: "Subaylar, onlarda devamlı olarak neden olduğun duygusal patlamalar sebebiyle odanın yakınında kalmaya sıcak bakmıyorlar. Kendilerine ve başkalarına zarar verenler bile olmuş."
languages.original_text: "The officers are reluctant to be quartered next to your chambers because of the constant emotional outbursts it causes them. Some even maim themselves and others."

traits.locale_text: "Subaylar, onlarda devamlı olarak neden olduğun duygusal patlamalar sebebiyle odanın yakınında kalmaya sıcak bakmıyorlar. Kendilerine ve başkalarına zarar verenler bile oldu."
